{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
if in_colab():
    cfg_path = "/content/drive/My Drive"
    cfg_name = "remote_colab_projects.ini"
    rp = RemoteProject(cfg_path, cfg_name)
    rp.projects
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
if in_colab():
    proj_name = "tsmodels"
    git_url = f'Rahuketu86/tsmodels'
    git_branch = "master"
    rp.add_project(proj_name, git_url, git_branch)
    rp.projects
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
if in_colab():
    path =rp.get_project('tsmodels')
    print(path)
    path.exists()
